entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
